data.title: Zeenat Aman Actress, Zeenat Aman Profile, Zeenat Aman Movies,Zeenat Aman Wallpapers,Zeenat Aman Photo Gallery
data.text:
- Nick Name: Babushka

- Date of Birth (Birthday): 19 November, 1951

- Zodiac Sign: Scorpio

- Height: 5'9"

- Hair Color: Black

- Birth Place: Germany

- Marital Status: Widow

- Languages: Hindi, English

- Education: St. Xavier's College (Mumbai), University of Southern California (Los Angeles)

Family Background

- Father's Name: Amanullah, Mr.Heinz (Step father)

- Mother's Name: Scinda

- Ex-Spouse: Mazhar Khan, Sanjay (Abbass) Khan

- Son: Azaan and Zahaan

Film Background (Filmography)

Debut Film: Hulchul (1971)

Famous Movies: Chaurahen, Ugly Aur Pagli, Sirf Romance: Love by Chance, Jaana: Let's Fall in Love, Boom, Bhopal Express, Gawahi, Tujhe Nahin Chhodunga, Namumkin, Daku Hasina, Aurat, Baat Ban Jaye, Haathon Ki Lakeeren, Amir Aadmi Gareeb Aadmi, Bhawani Junction, Yaadon Ki Kasam, Yaar Kasam, Meri Adalat, Jagir, Pakhandi, Sohni Mahiwal, Yeh Desh, Bandhan, Kuchchey Dhaagon Ka, Humse Hai Zamana, Mahaan, Pukar, Taqdeer, Vakil Babu, Gopichand Jasoos, Ashanti, Daulat, Jaanwar, Pyaas, Samraat, Teesri Aankh, Katilon Ke Kaatil, Krodhi, Laawaris, Professor Pyarelal, Insaf Ka Tarazu, Dostana, Qurbani, Alibaba Aur 40 Chor, Abdullah, Bombay 405 Miles, Ram Balram, Takkar, The Great Gambler, Cinema Cinema, Don, Satyam Shivam Sundaram: Love Sublime, Chor Ke Ghar Chor, Heeralal Pannalal, Shalimar, Aashiq Hoon Baharon Ka, Chhaila Babu, Darling Darling, Dharam Veer, Hum Kisi Se Kum Nahin, Kalabaaz, Paapi, Deewangee, Chori Mera Kaam, Warrant, Ajanabee, Ishq Ishq Ishq, Manoranjan, Prem Shastra, Roti Kapada Aur Makaan, Dhund, Heera Panna, Yaadon Ki Baaraat, Hare Raama Hare Krishna, Hulchul, Hungama, The Evil Within

Interesting Facts About Zeenat Aman

- Zeenat Aman won the Miss Asia Pacific contest in 1970.

- Zeenat Aman was the second runner up in the Miss India contes 1970.

- Zeenat Aman appeared on the cover of newly launched Cine Blitz magazine in December 1974.

- Zeenat Aman was the favourite cover girl of the popular magazine 'Stardust'.

- Zeenat Aman has campaigned for D. P. Yadav, a politician and local mafia don in the May 2007 Uttar Pradesh assembly election.

Awards and Honors

- Miss Asia Pacific 1970.

- Filmfare Best Supporting Actress Award (Hare Rama Hare Krishna) in 1972.

- BFJA Awards, Best Actress for Hare Rama Hare Krishnain 1972.

- Bollywood Awards 'Award for Lifetime Achievement'- Lifetime of Glamour in 2003.

- "Outstanding Contribution to the Motion Picture Industry of India Awards" at the eighth annual Bollywood Movie Awards. in 2006.

- Zee Cine Award for Lifetime Achievement in 2008.
